thread.title: Debi
thread.title_full: Discounted Designer Fabrics reviewed by Debi

author: Debi
title: Debi
text:
I received an excellent price on my fabric and it was shipped that very day. It arrived a few days later. This was the first time I have ordered from them and I was very pleased with the result. The fabric is great, the shipping quick. Their website is very functional, easy to navigate.
Couldn't have been better.
